attributes.action: Lower the Fuel costs Petrol/Diesel in the UK!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We have had enough with paying ridiculously high taxes on our wages, our homes, our businesses, our neighbourhoods and our vehicles - so instead of taxing us all the more, why not reward the country who gave you the position you have?

Fuel costs are disgusting and are only going to become more expensive, why is this? It's cost hasn't gone up as much as you charge us on it with the taxes, so how can you get away with it?

We ask that the Prime Minister do the right thing in his short lived life in the 'big seat' and look after his interests! £108.9p per litre is extaution! If things aren't improved and soon, we shall make a stand like in the past until change has taken place.

Freeze fuel costs - we know what you've done with Lybia, the land where water is worth more than Petrol. Show us that you are in charge of this 'once proud nation' - don't bow down to the beurocrats and the politically correct any longer, don't put others interests before our own.

Look after your people, and they will look after you!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
